query:
query customerDocumentDetails($input: customerDocumentDetailsRequest!) {
  customerDocumentDetails(request: $input) {
    billingDocumentItem
    salesDocumentItemType
    material
    billingDocumentItemText
    billingQuantity
    billingQuantityUnit
    salesMeasureISOUnit
    referenceSDDocument
    referenceSDDocumentItem
    referenceSDDocumentCategory
    grossAmount
    netAmount
    taxAmount
    transactionCurrency
    __typename
  }
}
